title: Hospital Emergency Departments (Szpitalny Oddział Ratunkowy - SOR)
subtitle: in Wrocław are open all day. They provide medical assistance in the case of emergencies. This takes a form of establishing an initial diagnosis and providing treatment necessary to stabilise life functions of patients whose health or life are in danger.
